name: Luiz Henrique Leocadio
coverLetter:
I've been working with my own grow and also with friends for the last 5 years. Have little trimming experience but can easily handle hard work and long shifts. I travel the world for rock climbing, originally from Brazil, also looking to grow experience and knowledge in the industry, looking forward for renewal of laws back in my country where i'll be able to be part of the growing scene.
Just need a place to setup my tent and stove but also food will be appreciate if offered.
Can start IMMEDIATELY!
